description.narrative: The Development Objective is to assist the recipient in: a) improving integratedwater resources management by strengthening water sector institutions; and b) expanding accessto water supply and sanitation services.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Cr. 5496-TZ | Description :Environment and social safeguard review | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Sec. II.A.3.(a) | Description :The Recipient shall prepare an Annual Work Plan and Budget for the Association'sagreement with other Development Partners, not later than May 15 of each year | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sec. III.A.(a) | Description :The Recipient shall prepare a Project Report (the annual state of the water andsanitation sector report) every year | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sec. III.A.(c) | Description :The Recipient shall carry out jointly with the Association and the otherDevelopment Partners a comprehensive midterm review | Due Date :29-Mar-2010
